ValidationRule.description: In the record type 'UK,' if the AML status is 'Approved,' then the related 'Listing' and the signed TOB received need to be true.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = "UK", ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Approved'), NOT(Listing__r.Signed_TOB_Received__c), ISNULL(Listing__c) = false ,
NOT(OR( ISPICKVAL( Role__c , 'Buyer'), ISPICKVAL(Role__c , 'Tenant'), ISPICKVAL(Role__c , 'Buyer POA') )) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: AML cant be Approved If "Sign TOB Received" is not marked on Listing
